name: Core_StringBuffer_getString
success: @{code('*RETURN')} was assigned a pointer to a @{code('Core_String')} object.
The UTF-8 symbol sequencs of that @{code('Core_String')} object is a copy of the UTF-8 symbol sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.
The caller acquired a reference to that  @{code('Core_String')} object.
description: Get a copy of the UTF-8 symbol sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object as a @{code('Core_String')} object.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
This function fails only with the specified errors/error conditions.
